Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 29 Å and 34 Å (mesoporous cages), 12 Å (pentagonal windows), 14.5 Å × 16 Å (hexagonal windows)

Other Information.Additional Info: Selective enrichment due to neutral charge and larger size compared to the pore windows of MIL-101
Excluded due to positive charge leading to electrostatic repulsion with coordinatively unsaturated metal sites in MIL-101
Excluded due to positive charge leading to electrostatic repulsion with coordinatively unsaturated metal sites in MIL-101

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with electrostatic interactions

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Ribonuclease A signal enhanced over two orders of magnitude; Cytochrome C and lysozyme excluded

Other Information.Additional Info: The material also demonstrated excellent adsorption performance for non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) in SPE applications.
